atom.chain package#

Submodules#

atom.chain.chain module#

class atom.chain.chain.ChainStore(netuid, chain='finney', wallet=None)[source]#

Bases: object

Chain based implementation for storing and retrieving information on chain.

async read(hotkey)[source]#

Reads the most recent data from the chain from the specified hotkey.

Return type:

str

async write(data, wait_for_inclusion=True, wait_for_finalization=True)[source]#

write to the subnet chain for a specific wallet.

atom.chain.chain_utils module#

atom.chain.chain_utils.json_reader(filepath)[source]#

atom.chain.generic module#

atom.chain.generic.run_in_subprocess(func, ttl, mode='fork')[source]#

Runs the provided function on a subprocess with ‘ttl’ seconds to complete.

Parameters:

  • func (functools.partial) – Function to be run.

  • ttl (int) – How long to try for in seconds.

  • mode (str) – Mode by which the multiprocessing context is obtained. Default to fork for pickling.

Returns:

The value returned by ‘func’

Return type:

Any
